alert.note: Alert for Hardin; Northern Jasper; Northern Orange; Southern Jasper; Tyler; Upper Jefferson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 17 at 2:22AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Jefferson, southeastern Tyler, Hardin, northwestern Orange and southeastern Jasper Counties through 300 AM CDT... At 221 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Village Mills to 7 miles north of Sour Lake to near Devers. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Beaumont, Lumberton, Vidor, Silsbee, Kountze, Sour Lake, Nome, Saratoga, Evadale, Fred, Buna, Bevil Oaks, China, Rose City, Pine Forest, Lakeview, Caney Head, Weiss Bluff, Honey Island and Village Mills. This includes Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 859 and 858, and between mile markers 853 and 844. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 500 AM CDT for southeastern Texas.

area.areaDesc: Hardin; Northern Jasper; Northern Orange; Southern Jasper; Tyler; Upper Jefferson
